text: Amazon quick site makes it really easy
for you to visualize your data in this
session we're going to see how you can
get to your first visualization in a few
seconds to get started navigate to the
new analysis option on the home screen
this provides the option to create a new
data set which you can do by uploading a
file for this demo we will use a CSV
file that contains revenue data for a
fictional Internet software company
once uploaded the file is ingested to
spice and the ingestion status is
displayed right next to the data set
details
one suggestion is complete you can
simply click on the data fields you'd
like to visualize in this case let's
pick revenue by segment you will notice
that with autograph Amazon quick site
automatically picks the Biograph as the
best representation of revenue versus
segment data but switches to a line
chart as soon as a date field is
introduced with this you've seen how
easy it is to visualize data in quick
sight get started with your own account
today
